title: European Language Resource Infrastructure (ELRI)
description: A comprehensive repository of language resources for European languages, including datasets, tools, and models for natural language processing.

title: BLOOM: A 176B-Parameter Open-Access Multilingual Language Model
description: Large-scale multilingual language model trained collaboratively by researchers across Europe and beyond.

title: European AI Ethics Guidelines
description: Comprehensive guidelines for ethical AI development and deployment in the European Union.

title: OpenGPT-X: European Foundation Models
description: A collection of European foundation models for various AI applications, developed with European data sovereignty in mind.

title: EuroVoc Multilingual Thesaurus
description: A multilingual thesaurus covering the activities of the EU and is used for indexing documents in EU institutions.
authors: Publications Office of the European Union
institution: Publications Office of the European Union

title: CLAIRE Vision Paper
description: Strategic vision document for Confederation of Laboratories for Artificial Intelligence Research in Europe.

title: Hugging Face Transformers Library
description: State-of-the-art machine learning library for natural language processing, computer vision, and audio processing.

title: European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts AI4Earth
description: AI models and datasets for weather prediction and climate research using European meteorological data.

title: FAIR Data Principles Implementation Guide
description: Comprehensive guide for implementing FAIR (Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, Reusable) data principles in AI research.

title: European AI Benchmark Suite
description: Standardized benchmarks for evaluating AI systems across different European languages and cultural contexts.
